Detailed Description

The Blackboard base class. A user algorithm must inherit from this class to implement its blackboard

Definition at line 464 of file LibAlgoSim.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Blackboard_base::Blackboard_base (  ) 

Initialises for listening events of type state

Definition at line 3 of file blackboard_base.cpp.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void Blackboard_base::Init (  )  [pure virtual]

The pure virtual (must be overridden) called only at the beginning, to initialise the blackboard or to draw the diagram on screen

virtual void Blackboard_base::nextStep (  )  [pure virtual]

Must be overridden by user algo. This is called whenever a change of state occurs. It should process the event and perform the necessary actions.

virtual void Blackboard_base::process ( const state &  s  )  [pure virtual]

Must be overridden by user algo. This is called whenever a event of type state occurs. It should process the state event and perform the necessary actions.

Parameters:
s the event parameter. The state for which blackboard actions are to be produced.

void Blackboard_base::processEvent ( const state &  s  ) 

Processes based of incoming states. Calls the virtual function process() for further processing by user blackboard class

Parameters:
s the state sent by the EventSender

Definition at line 7 of file blackboard_base.cpp.

Member Data Documentation

GrContext Blackboard_base::ctemp

GrContext object representing the screen just after drawing it. It is used by sprites to redraw after the circle has moved over a part.
